B.c. reg. 68/97 O.c. 248/97 Deposited march 6, 1997 This consolidation is current to march 5, 2024.
Health authorities act Royal inland hospital Amalgamation regulation Special resolution defined 1 For the purposes of section 16 (4) (c) of the Health authorities act , a special resolution for the royal inland hospital, incorporated Under
An act to incorporate the royal inland hospital , is defined as an approval by a majority of the voting members of the Corporation present at a meeting of the membership of the corporation, Called for the purpose of approving the amalgamation.
[provisions of the Health authorities act , r.s.b.c. 1996, c. 180, relevant to the enactment of this regulation:
